animeTitle: Wake Up, Girls! Deai no Kiroku: A Brief Recording
animeDescription: Special animation disc sold to advance ticket buyers of a Wake Up, Girls! preview event at Akihabara UDX. It contains audition footage of the main characters of the series that is not included in the movie.
animeRelated: ['Parent story: Wake Up, Girls! Shichinin no Idol']
